discussion.p: The constructor that type-erases an allocator has all of the problems of the similar function constructor that was removed for this CD. This constructor from packaged_task should similarly be removed as well. If we prefer to keep this constructor, the current wording is underspecified, as the Allocator argument is not required to be type satisfying the Allocator requirements, nor is allocator_traits used.

pre.del: template <class F, class Allocator> packaged_task(allocator_arg_t, const Allocator& a, F&& f);
